messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, this is Donna Savings, and we've just been robbed.
What is your address?
10381 South De Anza Boulevard.
Okay, hold on. Was there any vehicle involved?
Um, let me check with someone. Hold on.
Okay, did you see the vehicle?
Yes, it was a light gray or silver Buick Regal, a big sedan, four doors.
Did you get the license plate?
No, I didn't. I didn't realize what was going on until it was too late.
Can you switch me to someone who can give me a description of the suspect?
Sure, one moment.
Hello, I'm a customer. It's a black male.
Okay, how old approximately?
I would say between 30 and 40 years old.
Was there a weapon involved?
Yes, it was a handgun, an automatic.
Please stay on the line with me.
Okay.
Can you describe how tall he was?
Possibly 5'8".
And his weight?
About 180 to 195 pounds.
What was he wearing?
A dark-colored baseball cap, sunglasses, a mustache, and a plaid shirt.
What color was the plaid shirt?
Black, tan, and white.
Okay, thank you. Please stay safe. Authorities are on their way.
Thank you.
